main event: A UFO sighting involving ground radar and visual observation reported in Lynbrook, Long Island, New York on October 8, 1958.
interesting points: The object was detected by ground radar and visually confirmed,The sighting lasted for 4 minutes,The object was described as small and moved rapidly before hovering and disappearing, there was no explanation for the sighting,The radar was not operating normally at the time of detection.
witness description: The report does not specify full witness details but indicates involvement of radar detection and visual observation.
